children.subject: Talk to your advisor before doing anything. Since you're a double major you should check with both before doing anything

history.content:
Hi, I am a current declared L&S CS and declared Business Administration double major. I am looking to drop a class this semester, which will put me under 13 units for the first time ever. What is the process to do this? The class is a lower division CS requirement and I am planning to take an extra semester to graduate from both my majors. 


How do I go about this? Are there any implications/consequences for doing so? It's been a really stressful semester for me so I'd like any input on who to contact and how to go about it!
history.subject: Dropping a Class putting me under 13 units
